sentences.english: So each bailout has been ad hoc and panicky.
sentences.chinese: 于是每次救市是临时应对，伴随恐慌一片。

sentences.english: Compares says, Shanghai rescues the city movement also to calculate temperately .
sentences.chinese: 相比而言，上海的救市动作还算温和。

sentences.english: Well they actually did have to pay the bail-out money back.
sentences.chinese: 好吧他们实际上偿还了救市钱。

sentences.english: Secondly because they are not rich enough to finance their own bail-outs.
sentences.chinese: 其次是因为它们没有足够的钱来为救市融资。

sentences.english: In fact, market all quarters rescue the city dispute to tend to the superheating .
sentences.chinese: 事实上，市场各方的救市纷争已趋向白热化。

sentences.english: Shijiazhuang is most should the high-sounding talk rescue the city the city.
sentences.chinese: 石家庄才是最应该高调救市的城市。

sentences.english: I understand why the car companies need want a bailout.
sentences.chinese: 我理解为什么汽车巨头需要政府救市。

sentences.english: Even if it staves off disaster, the bail-out will cause huge problems.
sentences.chinese: 即使避开了灾难，救市仍然会带来很大的问题。

sentences.english: What this time rescued the city still to use was 42 dials thousand catties methods.
sentences.chinese: 本次救市仍然采用的是四两拨千斤的方法。

sentences.english: The rescue plan and austerity policy may be difficult for the public to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 或许，救市计划和紧缩政策让公众难以下咽。

sentences.english: We shouldn't over-bailout the market and we shouldn't force the economy to over-heat.
sentences.chinese: 救市政策不要过度，不能把经济搞得过于火热。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the president should not let himself be bullied.
sentences.chinese: 无需多言，总统不应受到此类“救市危言”的干扰。

sentences.english: The bailout plans will result in massive new issuance of U. S.
sentences.chinese: 救助计划会导致美国大举新发国债为救市举措筹资。

sentences.english: Simply put, this means no more taxpayer bailouts.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，这意味着不再让纳税人救市。

definition: hot money, money flowing from one currency to another in the hope of quick profit
financial leverage/leveraging (i.e. buying shares on borrowed funds)
subprime mortgage crisis/abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
